name: KeyWordCup
description:
A tabletop word game! Play 1-2 players on a single iPhone or 1-3 players on an iPad. Take turns completing the word riddle. All words have been carefully selected for family-friendly entertainment. Optionally play with time limits.

Reveal letters in the partly hidden word. Unusual letters score higher. Score 70 points to win the game.

In single-player mode, try to reach 70 points before you run out of guesses. With skill and some luck, you can do it!

There are 3 difficulty levels. If you select the Hard Level, the words are picked from a list of 20,000 words, so you don’t need to worry that the same words would reappear too often. All words have been checked against dictionaries and are used in their basic forms. They are 6–14 letters, or sometimes 5 at the Easy Level.

If you for instance play child vs adult, you can activate the handicap system, to give one player a 10-point head start, or 20 or even more.

KeyWordCup is suitable from about 7–8 years of age with no upper limit.

The game can be played with English, German or Swedish words.
